item.title: OldSchool Runescape Bot Website - OSBot
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“OSBot, post:6, topic:553337”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=672252.msg4495964#msg4495964 date=1442695603]
As said above I don’t think you can advertise this here. Also at least show some functionality of your bot, I’m sure someone who’s botting doesn’t give a shit about the wireframe, it’s pointless so I don’t know why you’ve advertised that.
[/quote]

Well we have 150k+ registered users, and are one of the biggest bots, its just an advertisement thread. I could make a video I guess, but why? Most people know the functionality of bots.[/quote]

I’m sure everyone knows what a bot is, but there’s many features to a bot to make it undetectable etc, and whether your bot has that is a different story. Also there have been cases of accounts being stolen with bots and especially with Java it’s definitely not hard to hide a snippet of code to steal login data but I guess that’s me being paranoid.

You’re advertising to gain a bigger audience right? You should add some more media or something to make it more convincing because personally it’s not doing it for me. However, good luck, I’m sure you have a massive audience already.

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchool Runescape Bot Website - OSBot
item.dc:creator: @OSBot OSBot
item.description:
@OSBot wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

Not a server, so you can’t really advertise that here, maybe in RuneScape discussion, bring up a subtle discussion post of this.

Yeah I didn’t really know where to post it, if I could at all. I just posted it here hoping if it was the wrong section a mod would correct it for me as I didn’t know. Figured there are some users playing 07 and wanted to bot.
